snippet: Several studies indicate a growing education gap between the rich and the poor, which extends to college.
abstract: Several studies indicate a growing education gap between the rich and the poor, which extends to college.
lead_paragraph: Our colleague Sabrina Tavernise wrote a story on Friday about studies that indicate a growing education gap in America between the rich and poor. The studies, derived from data measured before the recession, show that the divide is also growing in college while the education gap between black and white children has narrowed.

headline.main: College Is Increasingly Out of Reach for the Poor, Studies Find
